titulo: Ejecutivo de Cuentas para servicios Marketing/SEO consulting

If you are familiar with the world of gaming, have sales skills, have empathy, have knowledge of SEO - you are the one we are looking for. You can see more of our project at: https://gamerseo.com/  Requirements - Experience in SEO consulting and marketing - Advanced English (C1) - Good organization and database management - Sales and customer service skills -Customer's billboard tracking    We offer: - Contract order - Completely remote operation - Attractive salary - Good working environment and friendly atmosphere - Opportunity for growth and development   Are you interested? Send your CV (in English) to our e-mail: [OBSCURED] With the subject: "SEO Sales
